title: Wedding Invitation Font?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065346im_/http:/typophile.com/files/my_sweet_love_wedding_invitation_charcoal_4828.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065346im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Rebecca_4278.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065346im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Michelle_3719.png)

Would love to find out which font was used to write the text "Katie and James". I believe the subsequent images "Rebecca" and "Michelle" were both written using the same font. Any help would be greatly appreciated!

(The images are from the website [http://theprintfairy.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065346/http:/theprintfairy.com/ "http://theprintfairy.com/"))

Font: 

 Cantoni 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065346/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: loiety

comments.content: Oh my God, you are AMAZING! Thank you!
